name: RVLS GAMEDAY BOX
description: The ultimate box to be gameday ready. All Contents May Contain Exclusive Unreleased Apparel from Winter 2014. Such includes: Rivaux Jersey Unreleased Headwear Unreleased T-Shirts Unreleased Longsleeves Unreleased Random Goodies You won't be shorthanded and will be fully geared heading into the New Year of 2014. Please order upon your shirt size. All headwear is one size fits all. *Most apparel is preorder, please allow up to 2 - 4 weeks for box to arrive.

name: RVLS X 909HHDT // VICIOUS
description:
As part of a fundraiser, this is a special collaboration with the 909 Hip Hop Dance Team. Thank you for the support.

100% cotton tshirt with white design print on front.
Left sleeve print.

Limited quantities will be made. This is a preorder and will be available 1 - 2 weeks after this date: 11.18.2013

<font color="red">Note:</font> If you prefer to pick up your order from a fellow 909HHDT member, please use the code: "909" at checkout for free shipping. You must pick up, the item will not be shipped.

name: BANANAS! CD - Esta
description: Physical Copy of Esta's new beat tape: BANANAS! Album features 16 Instrumental Beat Tracks. Album can be streamed/purchased via download here. Order also includes a free Beatrock Music Sticker. Check out BEATSBYESTA.COM for more on the producer. _______________________
